mapper.select: SELECT song.sid, song.sname, song.songerid, songer.sname AS songername, zhuanji.zname AS zjname, song.zjid FROM songer, song LEFT JOIN zhuanji ON song.zjid = zhuanji.zhujiid WHERE song.songerid = songer.sid AND song.sname LIKE CONCAT('%','${searchParam}','%' ) ORDER BY song.cjtime DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

select song.type as key_, count(song.sid) as value_ from song
GROUP BY type;

select count(*) from
songer, song LEFT JOIN zhuanji ON song.zjid = zhuanji.zhujiid WHERE song.songerid = songer.sid AND song.sname LIKE CONCAT('%','${value}','%' )
zhuanji WHERE zhuanji.zname LIKE CONCAT('%','${value}','%' )
songer WHERE songer.sname LIKE CONCAT('%','${value}','%' )
SELECT songer.sname, songer.sid, songer.head FROM songer WHERE songer.sname LIKE CONCAT('%','${searchParam}','%' ) ORDER BY songer.sid DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT zhuanji.zname as aname, zhuanji.zhujiid as albumId, zhuanji.img FROM zhuanji WHERE zhuanji.zname LIKE CONCAT('%','${searchParam}','%' ) ORDER BY zhuanji.zhujiid DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT zhujiId as albumId, zname as aname, js, zhuanji.songerId, songer.sname as singername, zhuanji.fxgs, zhuanji.typeId, zhuanji.fbtime, zhuanji.cjtime, zhuanji.img FROM zhuanji,songer where zhuanji.songerId=songer.sid order by fbtime desc limit 0,6;
SELECT song.sid, song.sname as name, songer.sid as si_id, songer.sname as singername FROM song,songer where song.songerid=songer.sid order by fbtime desc limit 0,15
SELECT song.sid, song.sname as name, songer.sid as si_id, songer.sname as singername FROM song,songer where song.songerid=songer.sid order by fbtime desc limit #{start},#{length}

SELECT song.sid, song.sname AS NAME, songer.sid AS si_id, songer.sname AS singername FROM songer, song left join click on song.sid=click.id WHERE song.songerid = songer.sid and song.type= #{songType} ORDER BY click.count DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT song.sid, song.sname AS NAME, songer.sid AS si_id, songer.sname AS singername FROM songer, song left join click on song.sid=click.id WHERE song.songerid = songer.sid ORDER BY
song.cjtime desc ,
click.count DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT s.sid, s.sname, s.sex, s.jieshao, s.head, s.typeid FROM songer s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sum(c.count) AS count, s1.songerid FROM song s1, click c WHERE s1.sid = c.id GROUP BY s1.songerid ORDER BY count DESC ) s2 ON s.sid = s2.songerid LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
